Contact Us

Have a question about the blog or the TextMyLink app? We'd love to hear from you.

Whether you're planning your wedding, testing out TextMyLink, or just looking for better ways to communicate with your guests, we're here to help.

Email us anytime at Daniel@textmylink.com.

We read every message (really) and do our best to reply within a few days.
